name: Cyber Elite
description:
You are Fred, a Cyber Elite mercenary who has been tasked with infiltrating a site overrun by a rogue AI. Utilise your skills to traverse through hostile environments, use computer terminals to your advantage and collect credit chips to sweeten the deal. The quicker you get in and out, the better. Good luck...

Cyber Elite is a 2D Puzzle Platformer where the player must use platforms and terminals in order to reach the next part of the level, completing it in the fastest time and collecting the most credit cards to increase your score

This game was created for a University 10 week project
